testcase.name: Checking Account Balance after Deposit - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given my checking account has a balance of $500.............................passed And I have recently made a deposit of $100..................................passed When I check my account balance.............................................passed Then I should see $600 as the balance.......................................passed But there is an overdraft fee of $50........................................passed And the available balance should be $550....................................passed

testcase.name: Checking Account Balance after Withdrawal
testcase.system-out: Given my checking account has a balance of $500.............................passed And I have recently made a withdrawal of $100...............................passed When I check my account balance.............................................passed Then I should see $400 as the balance.......................................passed But there is a credit interest of $50.......................................passed And the available balance should be $450....................................passed

testcase.name: Checking Account Balance after Withdrawal In-Sufficient Balance
testcase.system-out: Given my checking account has a balance of $500.............................passed When I request to withdraw $700.............................................passed Then I should see an Error..................................................passed And the available balance should be $500....................................passed
